unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jasprit Bumrah's back? Heard it might affect his chances for the Asia Cup. Dr. Sharma mentioned 3 weeks of rest, but is it confirmed? Also, news about the kabaddi player from Patna, lost 23 sq ft due to an accident. Rs. 5 Lakh sanctioned for his treatment from AIIMS! Hopefully, he recovers soon! Any insights from the BCCI side are welcome!
